Index.title: Welcome to FitPersona
Index.description: Your journey to a healthier lifestyle starts here

track.title: Track Your Progress
track.description: Monitor your fitness journey with detailed tracking of workouts, measurements, and achievements

plans.title: Personalized Plans
plans.description: Get customized workout and nutrition plans tailored to your goals and preferences

community.title: Join the Community
community.description: Connect with like-minded people, share experiences, and stay motivated together

auth.loginSubtitle: Enter your credentials to access your account
auth.registerSubtitle: Join FitPersona and start your fitness journey

onboarding.title: Create Your Personal Fitness Profile
onboarding.description: Help us create a personalized fitness and nutrition plan by answering a few questions.

lose_weight.title: Lose Weight
lose_weight.description: I want to lose weight and burn fat

gain_muscle.title: Gain Muscle
gain_muscle.description: I want to increase muscle mass and gain strength

maintain_fitness.title: Stay Fit
maintain_fitness.description: I want to maintain my current fitness level and stay healthy

activityLevel.title: What is your activity level?
activityLevel.sedentary_description: I mostly work sitting down and do very little exercise
activityLevel.lightly_active_description: Light exercise or daily walks 1-3 days per week
activityLevel.active_description: Moderate intensity exercise 3-5 days per week
activityLevel.very_active_description: Intense exercise or physical work 6-7 days per week

equipment.title: Choose your workout location
equipment.body_weight_description: I want to exercise using just my body weight
equipment.home_equipment_description: I have some fitness equipment at home
equipment.gym_description: I will work out at a gym

health.title: Do you have any health conditions or allergies?
health.description: Select any health conditions or allergies you may have. Leave empty if none.
